bill.summary:
Kathryn Manginelli Act of 2019 or the Compassionate Retirement Act of 2019
This bill permits early distributions, without penalty, from tax-preferred pension plans to individuals diagnosed with a terminal illness (i.e., an illness or physical condition that can be reasonably expected to result in death seven years after diagnosis).
